hadiths.text: Narrated Anas: "The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) prohibited that a man should put on sandals while he is standing." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Gharib. Muhammad bin Isma'il said: "This Hadith is not correct, not the Hadith of Ma'mar from 'Ammar bin Abi 'Ammar, from Abu Hurairah (no.1775)
